name: Dr Kopman's Adventures 2 - Return of the Wizard
name_original: Dr Kopman's Adventures 2 - Return of the Wizard
description:
Dr Kopman's Adventures 2

You play as a 17yr old teen, curious by his tutors odd behaviour. He decides to sneak into college at night to find out what goes on when the students aren't around. What horrors lurk in the I.T department during the night... it's up to you to find out.  

The game was made as a parody of a group of college tutors, they all had unique traits and personalities and I felt they'd be perfect in a horror game!

The Characters: 

Dr I. Kopman

Dr I. Kopman, simply known as Kopman is the evil capitalistic mastermind of the Kop universe. A once simple businessman turned mad by money and his love of Excel spreadsheets. Kopman only cares about your business and taking it over by whatever means possible. Kopman can utilize these captured businesses against anyone who stands in his way. So, prepare for the hostile takeover of your life…

Trucker Jones

Trucker Jones was once the arch-nemesis of the Kopman, a clash caused by the in-different love between Spreadsheets and Databases. Kopman converted him over time to become one of his servants… Trucker now protects the Kopman and will do anything in his power to prevent the man he now serves from being touched, don’t judge him for his friendly looks though!

The Marketman

The Marketman is the closest and most loyal accomplice of Kopman. A man obsessed water gave him the ability to water bend. The Marketman will do anything to protect his love for Water, and the equally important Kopman.  Be prepared to be towered by him and try to not suffocate under his waves. 

Kappa

Kappa is the somewhat discrete and clairvoyant servant of Kopman. A man of information who Kopman relies on to help expand his empire of illegitimate businesses. Kappa relies on “Fresh Air”, which enhances his perception on things.

Controls

Normal Game - WASD (to move), F for flashlight, L-CTRL for mask, Hold Shift to run

Boss Battle - WASD (to move), hold right click to aim gun, Hold Shift to run

Notes

Music on the boss battle is from the PS2 Era R&C games, this game was made entirely just for fun and not profit hence why I included them, the songs from PS2 era R&C are amazing. 

All the voice lines of the characters in were recorded from lectures during lockdown. 

You can select harder or easier difficulty settings in the options menu. If the game is too dark, the brightness can be turned up also in the options menu.
